message.content: Gemini CLI도 너처럼 비슷하게 사용할수 있어?

input.thought:
사용자가 Gemini CLI에 대해 묻고 있는데, 이는 Claude Code와 비교하여 비슷한 기능을 제공하는지에 대한 질문으로 보인다. 먼저 Gemini CLI가 무엇인지, 그리고 Claude Code와 어떤 차이점이 있는지 파악해야 한다. 

Claude Code는 Anthropic의 공식 CLI 도구로, 코드 편집, 파일 관리, 프로젝트 작업 등을 지원한다. 반면 Gemini CLI는 Google의 Gemini AI 모델을 명령줄에서 사용할 수 있게 해주는 도구일 것이다.

사용자의 질문에 정확히 답하기 위해서는 Gemini CLI의 현재 상태와 기능을 확인해야 한다.

input.query: Gemini CLI Google 2025 features capabilities coding programming

content.content:
Web search results for query: "Gemini CLI Google 2025 features capabilities coding programming"

Links: [{"title":"Google announces Gemini CLI: your open-source AI agent","url":"https://blog.google/technology/developers/introducing-gemini-cli-open-source-ai-agent/"},{"title":"GitHub - google-gemini/gemini-cli: An open-source AI agent that brings the power of Gemini directly into your terminal.","url":"https://github.com/google-gemini/gemini-cli"},{"title":"Gemini Code Assist’s June 2025 updates: Agent Mode arrives","url":"https://blog.google/technology/developers/gemini-code-assist-updates-july-2025/"},{"title":"Gemini CLI | Gemini Code Assist | Google for Developers","url":"https://developers.google.com/gemini-code-assist/docs/gemini-cli"},{"title":"Google unveils Gemini CLI, an open source AI tool for terminals | TechCrunch","url":"https://techcrunch.com/2025/06/25/google-unveils-gemini-cli-an-open-source-ai-tool-for-terminals/"},{"title":"Gemini CLI | Gemini for Google Cloud","url":"https://cloud.google.com/gemini/docs/codeassist/gemini-cli"},{"title":"Google positions itself for 'next decade' of AI as Gemini CLI arrives with generous free tier • DEVCLASS","url":"https://devclass.com/2025/06/25/google-positions-itself-for-next-decade-of-ai-as-gemini-cli-arrives-with-generous-free-tier/"},{"title":"Google Releases Gemini CLI: Free and Open-Source AI Agent for Developers","url":"https://www.androidsage.com/2025/06/25/google-releases-gemini-cli-for-developers/"},{"title":"Gemini Code Assist overview | Google for Developers","url":"https://developers.google.com/gemini-code-assist/docs/overview"},{"title":"Forget about AI costs: Google just changed the game with open-source Gemini CLI that will be free for most developers | VentureBeat","url":"https://venturebeat.com/ai/google-is-redefining-enterprise-ai-economics-with-open-source-gemini-cli-that-will-be-free-for-the-majority-of-developers/"}]

Based on the search results, here's a comprehensive overview of Google's Gemini CLI features and capabilities for coding and programming in 2025:

## Overview

Google's Gemini CLI is an open-source AI agent that brings the power of Gemini directly into your terminal, and it's open source. Now in preview, Gemini CLI provides powerful AI capabilities, from code understanding and file manipulation to command execution and dynamic troubleshooting.

## Key Features and Capabilities

### Coding and Programming Features
Gemini CLI provides powerful AI capabilities, from code understanding and file manipulation to command execution and dynamic troubleshooting. It offers a fundamental upgrade to your command line experience, enabling you to write code, debug issues and streamline your workflow.

**Specific coding capabilities include:**
- Query and edit large codebases in and beyond Gemini's 1M token context window
- Generate new apps from PDFs or sketches, using Gemini's multimodal capabilities
- Automate operational tasks, like querying pull requests or handling complex rebases
- Writing code, debugging issues, managing projects, querying documentation, and explaining code

### Technical Architecture
The Gemini CLI uses a reason and act (ReAct) loop with your built-in tools and local or remote MCP servers to complete complex use cases like fixing bugs, creating new features, and improving test coverage.

### Free Tier and Access
To use Gemini CLI free-of-charge, simply login with a personal Google account to get a free Gemini Code Assist license. That free license gets you access to Gemini 2.5 Pro and its massive 1 million token context window. To ensure you rarely, if ever, hit a limit during this preview, we offer the industry's largest allowance: 60 model requests per minute and 1,000 requests per day at no charge.

### Integration and Extensibility
Its power comes from built-in tools allowing you to: Ground prompts with Google Search so you can fetch web pages and provide real-time, external context to the model · Extend Gemini CLI's capabilities through built-in support for the Model Context Protocol (MCP) or bundled extensions · Customize prompts and instructions to tailor Gemini for your specific needs and workflows · Automate tasks and integrate with existing workflows by invoking Gemini CLI non-interactively within your scripts.

### Agent Mode Integration
Gemini CLI brings AI directly into the command line, eliminating context switching by letting developers ask questions, generate code and debug right in their terminal. Taking this further, Gemini Code Assist's new agent mode acts as an AI pair programmer. It analyzes your entire codebase to plan and execute complex, multi-file tasks — like implementing new features or performing large refactors, all from a single prompt, significantly accelerating the development process.

### Platform Support and Installation
Gemini CLI runs on Mac, Linux (including ChromeOS) and Windows; and unlike Claude Code or Codex, the Windows version is native rather than requiring WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux).

### Security Features
Gemini CLI operates as a local agent with built-in security measures that address common concerns about AI command execution. The system requires explicit user confirmation for each command, with options to "allow once," "always allow" or deny specific operations.

### Open Source Nature
Because Gemini CLI is fully open source (Apache 2.0), developers can inspect the code to understand how it works and verify its security implications.

The tool represents Google's significant push into the developer CLI space, competing directly with similar offerings from OpenAI and Anthropic, but distinguishing itself through its generous free tier and open-source approach.

results:
Based on the search results, here's a comprehensive overview of Google's Gemini CLI features and capabilities for coding and programming in 2025:

## Overview

Google's Gemini CLI is an open-source AI agent that brings the power of Gemini directly into your terminal, and it's open source. Now in preview, Gemini CLI provides powerful AI capabilities, from code understanding and file manipulation to command execution and dynamic troubleshooting.

## Key Features and Capabilities

### Coding and Programming Features
Gemini CLI provides powerful AI capabilities, from code understanding and file manipulation to command execution and dynamic troubleshooting. It offers a fundamental upgrade to your command line experience, enabling you to write code, debug issues and streamline your workflow.

**Specific coding capabilities include:**
- Query and edit large codebases in and beyond Gemini's 1M token context window
- Generate new apps from PDFs or sketches, using Gemini's multimodal capabilities
- Automate operational tasks, like querying pull requests or handling complex rebases
- Writing code, debugging issues, managing projects, querying documentation, and explaining code

### Technical Architecture
The Gemini CLI uses a reason and act (ReAct) loop with your built-in tools and local or remote MCP servers to complete complex use cases like fixing bugs, creating new features, and improving test coverage.

### Free Tier and Access
To use Gemini CLI free-of-charge, simply login with a personal Google account to get a free Gemini Code Assist license. That free license gets you access to Gemini 2.5 Pro and its massive 1 million token context window. To ensure you rarely, if ever, hit a limit during this preview, we offer the industry's largest allowance: 60 model requests per minute and 1,000 requests per day at no charge.

### Integration and Extensibility
Its power comes from built-in tools allowing you to: Ground prompts with Google Search so you can fetch web pages and provide real-time, external context to the model · Extend Gemini CLI's capabilities through built-in support for the Model Context Protocol (MCP) or bundled extensions · Customize prompts and instructions to tailor Gemini for your specific needs and workflows · Automate tasks and integrate with existing workflows by invoking Gemini CLI non-interactively within your scripts.

### Agent Mode Integration
Gemini CLI brings AI directly into the command line, eliminating context switching by letting developers ask questions, generate code and debug right in their terminal. Taking this further, Gemini Code Assist's new agent mode acts as an AI pair programmer. It analyzes your entire codebase to plan and execute complex, multi-file tasks — like implementing new features or performing large refactors, all from a single prompt, significantly accelerating the development process.

### Platform Support and Installation
Gemini CLI runs on Mac, Linux (including ChromeOS) and Windows; and unlike Claude Code or Codex, the Windows version is native rather than requiring WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux).

### Security Features
Gemini CLI operates as a local agent with built-in security measures that address common concerns about AI command execution. The system requires explicit user confirmation for each command, with options to "allow once," "always allow" or deny specific operations.

### Open Source Nature
Because Gemini CLI is fully open source (Apache 2.0), developers can inspect the code to understand how it works and verify its security implications.

The tool represents Google's significant push into the developer CLI space, competing directly with similar offerings from OpenAI and Anthropic, but distinguishing itself through its generous free tier and open-source approach.

input.thought:
이제 Gemini CLI에 대한 정보를 얻었다. Google의 Gemini CLI는 2025년에 출시된 오픈소스 AI 에이전트로, 터미널에서 직접 Gemini AI를 사용할 수 있게 해준다. 주요 특징들을 Claude Code와 비교해보자:

**유사점:**
- 둘 다 CLI 기반 AI 코딩 도구
- 코드 편집, 파일 조작, 프로젝트 관리 기능
- 대화형 인터페이스
- 코드 생성, 디버깅, 설명 기능
- MCP (Model Context Protocol) 지원

**차이점:**
- Gemini CLI: 오픈소스, 무료 티어가 매우 관대함 (하루 1,000 요청)
- Claude Code: Anthropic의 공식 CLI, 유료 서비스
- Gemini CLI: 1M 토큰 컨텍스트 윈도우
- Claude Code: 더 성숙한 도구 생태계와 통합

사용자에게 간결하고 정확한 답변을 제공해야 한다.
이제 사용자에게 간결하고 정확한 답변을 제공할 수 있다. 한국어로 질문했으므로 한국어로 답변하고, 주요 유사점과 차이점을 중심으로 설명하되 4줄 이내로 간결하게 정리해야 한다.

content.text:
네, Gemini CLI도 Claude Code와 매우 유사하게 사용할 수 있습니다. 둘 다 터미널에서 AI와 대화하며 코드 작성, 편집, 디버깅, 프로젝트 관리가 가능합니다.

주요 차이점은 Gemini CLI가 오픈소스이고 무료 티어가 매우 관대하며(하루 1,000 요청), 1M 토큰의 큰 컨텍스트 윈도우를 제공한다는 점입니다.

기본적인 사용 패턴과 기능은 Claude Code와 거의 동일하므로, 어느 것을 사용하든 비슷한 개발 경험을 얻을 수 있습니다.
